Package epoetics.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Annotation
    This class represents an arbitrary annotation in a text.
    Chapter
    This class represents chapters in a book, sections in a scientific work and in general every textual unit of organization which is potentially larger than a single page.
    Document
    This class represents a document, the logically largest unit, the artefact containing all linguistic elements like chapters, sentences, tokens.
    GATE_Converter  
    Keyword
    This class represents a keyword.
    Line
    This class represents a textual line.
    Linguistic_Element
    This class is the base class for all linguistic and organizational elements of a text.
    MakeDocument
    This class contains methods for constructing a document and attaching linguistic units to it.
    Page
    This class represents a page.
    Paragraph
    This class represents a paragraph.
    Sentence
    This class represents a sentence.
    SimilarityFunctions
    This class contains functions for computing the similarity between texts and functions for computing keyword-sets in the form of tag clouds from arbitrary levels of the linguistic and conceptual hierarchy.
    Tag_Cloud
    This class represents a tag cloud containing words which are significant for the linguistic element it is computed from.
    Token
    This class represents tokens.
    Utils
    Utility functions for common tasks and convenience methods for tasks which can be implemented with a few lines of code.
